[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input  logic [7:0] in,
    output logic parity
);
    always @(*) begin
        parity = in[0] ^ in[1] ^ in[2] ^ in[3] ^ in[4] ^ in[5] ^ in[6] ^ in[7];
    end
endmodule
[DONE]
```
